item.title: 18 - analytics charts
item.description:
18 - analytics charts

This is a weird one. I've always felt like I wanted to do something like this, but I end up getting really bored halfway through it. I'm not entirely unhappy with how this turned out, though. powerfulemoji.cool is a stupid address

item.title: 17 - email receipt
item.description:
17 - email receipt

Much happier with this one than the one on the previous day. Might actually pitch this to the actual business ;)

item.title: 16 - popup
item.description:
16 - popup

I'm running pretty low on inspiration here - tried to do something slightly different to older stuff, but coming up empty. Move on :(

item.title: 15 - on/off switch
item.description:
15 - on/off switch

I'm not too sure about this one. I've kind of gone for the power on/off thing, but I'm not entirely sure whether I like it. Trying to do some stuff without text, something a bit more accessible.

item.title: 14 - countdown timer
item.description:
14 - countdown timer

This one looked a lot better in my brain before I started making it unfortunately. The idea here is that the outer ring will signify minutes and the inner will show seconds, so you have that sort of dual display thing

item.title: 13 - direct message
item.description:
13 - direct message

Kinda fucked this one up by not bottom-aligning the messages - live and learn! I can't write dialogue either

item.title: 12 - e-commerce item
item.description:
12 - e-commerce item

This one has probably been my favourite so far. Really enjoyed doing this; some really brilliant imagery and some really simple typography and flat ui elements. So fun :)

item.title: 11 - flash message (success/failure)
item.description:
11 - flash message (success/failure)

Pretty much the minute I finished this design, I implemented it in my company's software. We needed a really simple, poppy flash card - imo

item.title: 10 - social share
item.description:
10 - social share

My aim for this one was to show the whole "this network has x posts, this one has y posts" etc. Not sure it really works, the whole circle motif is starting to really bleed into my designs

item.title: 9 - music player
item.description:
9 - music player

This is the shit, absolutely loved doing this one. Shout out to Rivers of Nihil - what a crushing album to end 2015
